i1.name: Dream-Laden_Bough
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Lillia's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] apply ''Dream Dust'' to enemies hit, which deals{{ft|{{as|6% {{as|(+ {{fd|1.2}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|'''total''' magic damage}} over 3 seconds,|{{as|1% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.2}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds over 3 seconds,}}capped at {{pp|40 to 100}} damage against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.

'''Lillia''' {{tip|heals}} for {{pp|24 to 75}} {{as|(+ {{fd|5.4}}% AP)}} against large {{tip|monsters}} and {{pp|10.5 to 124.5}} {{as|(+ 18% AP)}} against {{tip|champions}} over the duration of ''Dream Dust'', reduced to 33% effectiveness for each target beyond the first. She may only heal against 1 {{tip|monster}} at a time.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Lillia's champion ability apply Dream Dust to enemies hit, which dealscapped at 40 − 100 (based on level) damage against monsters.
Lillia heals for 24 − 75 (based on level) (+ 5.4% AP) against large monsters and 10.5 − 124.5 (based on level) (+ 18% AP) against champions over the duration of Dream Dust, reduced to 33% effectiveness for each target beyond the first. She may only heal against 1 monster at a time.
i1.notes:
* {{ais|Lilting Lullaby|Lillia}} application does not apply ''Dream Dust'', but its triggering damage does.
* ''Dream Dust'' is applied even if the target takes no damage from an ability, e.g. by being {{tip|shield|shielded}} or {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}}, but not when the ability hit is prevented in the first place (e.g. {{tip|spell shield}}).

q1.name: Blooming_Blows
description:
{{sbc|Passive:}} Whenever '''Lillia's''' abilities hit at least one enemy, she generates a stack of ''Prance'' for {{fd|6.5}} seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 4 times. Stacks expire by one every {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

{{sbc|Prance:}} For each stack, '''Lillia''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Lillia''' swings her censer around her, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies. Enemies hit within the outer edge of the area additionally take the same amount as {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Whenever Lillia's abilities hit at least one enemy, she generates a stack of Prance for 6.5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 4 times. Stacks expire by one every 1.5 seconds.

Prance: For each stack, Lillia gains bonus movement speed.
Active: Lillia swings her censer around her, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit within the outer edge of the area additionally take the same amount as bonus true damage.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|3 to 7}}% {{as|(+ 3% per 100 AP)}}|Maximum Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|3*4 to 7*4}}% {{as|(+ 12% per 100 AP)}}}}
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|35 to 95}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|35*2 to 95*2}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
q1.notes:
* '''Lillia''' can move during ''Blooming Blows' ''cast time.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent '''Lillia''' from gaining a ''Prance'' stack.
* For the purpose of aim-assist, '''Lillia's''' {{stil|attack range}} is reduced{{ft|to 275|by 50}}during ''Blooming Blows's'' cast time.

effects.str:
• Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 3% per 100 AP)
  • Maximum Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 12% per 100 AP)

• Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)
  • Total Mixed Damage: (+ 80% AP)

w1.name: Watch_Out!_Eep!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lillia''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to 150 units in front of the target area over {{rutngt|0.75}}, though not through terrain, and deals {{as|magic damage}} in an area around the target spot. Enemies hit within the epicenter are dealt {{ccs|200% increased damage|magic}}.
''Watch Out! Eep! will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lillia dashes to 150 units in front of the target area over 0.759, though not through terrain, and deals magic damage in an area around the target spot. Enemies hit within the epicenter are dealt Unknown value: ccs / 200% increased damage / magic.
Watch Out! Eep! deals 50% damage to minions.
Watch Out! Eep! will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 160}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|80*3 to 160*3}} {{as|(+ 105% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* '''Lillia''' dashes to her target location over {{tt|{{fd|0.627}} to {{fd|0.759}} seconds|0.6 to 0.75 seconds, but rounded to the next game tick}}, but cannot move before the strike goes off at {{fd|0.759}} seconds, regardless.
* '''Lillia''' can hop over the edges of certain walls despite the ability being unable to traverse terrain.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 35% AP)
  • Increased Damage: (+ 105% AP)

• Minion Damage: (+ 17.5% AP)
  • Increased Minion Damage: (+ 52.5% AP)

e1.name: Swirlseed
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lillia''' lobs a seed at the target area that rolls forward indefinitely. The seed detonates upon hitting an enemy or terrain while on the ground, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies in a cone, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 40% for 3 seconds and {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them for 2 seconds.
''Swirlseed will cast at max range if cast beyond that. The spot at which the seed will last collide with terrain is highlighted while it is rolling.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lillia lobs a seed at the target area that rolls forward indefinitely. The seed detonates upon hitting an enemy or terrain while on the ground, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone, slowing them by 40% for 3 seconds and revealing them for 2 seconds.
Swirlseed will cast at max range if cast beyond that. The spot at which the seed will last collide with terrain is highlighted while it is rolling.
e1.notes:
* ''Swirlseed's'' origin is determined from '''Lillia's''' position at the start of cast, the rolling direction is determined from '''Lillia's''' position at the end of cast (when the projectile is created, not when the seed starts rolling).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent the seed from detonating thus striking nearby targets.
* {{tip|Projectile|Projectile destroying effects}} will still make the rolling seed detonate upon colliding with them, but not when the initial arcing missile is destroyed.
** If {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} blocks the initial projectile, it is destroyed and deals 0 damage to him, as well as not triggering the cone-shaped area of effect.
[[File: Swirlseed collision indicator.png|175px|thumb|left|Collision indicator]]

r1.name: Lilting_Lullaby
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lillia''' casts a magical lullaby over all targetable enemy {{tip|champions}} affected by {{ai|Dream-Laden Bough|Lillia|Dream Dust}}, which {{tt|arrives after {{fd|0.3}} seconds|fixed travel time missile}} and renders them {{tip|drowsy}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 10%. After the duration, they fall {{tip|asleep}} for a few seconds.

The next instance of non-{{tip|persistent damage|persistent}} non-{{tip|minion}} non-small and medium {{tip|monster}} damage taken by each of the {{tip|sleep|sleeping}} targets consumes the debuff to deal additional {{as|magic damage}}.
''An enemy champion affected by {{ai|Dream-Laden Bough|Lillia|Dream Dust}} is required to cast this ability.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lillia casts a magical lullaby over all targetable enemy champions affected by Lillia's Dream Dust, which arrives after 0.3 seconds and renders them drowsy for 1.5 seconds, slowing them by 10%. After the duration, they fall asleep for a few seconds.
The next instance of non-persistent non-minion non-small and medium monster damage taken by each of the sleeping targets consumes the debuff to deal additional magic damage.
An enemy champion affected by Lillia's Dream Dust is required to cast this ability.
r1.notes:
* The {{tip|sleep}} debuff is named ''Shhh.. They're Asleep''.
* '''Lillia''' can move during ''Lilting Lullaby's'' cast time.
* The additional {{as|magic damage}} dealt is accredited to '''Lillia''' and benefits from her {{sti|{{as|magic penetration}}}}.
* ''Lilting Lullaby's'' missile will still hit even if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} during the cast time.{{bug}}
** If the target becomes so while it is travelling, it will be destroyed.
* ''Lilting Lullaby's'' application does not trigger aggro from {{tip|turret|turrets}}, only its triggering damage does.
** {{ai|Dream-Laden Bough|Lillia|Dream Dust's}} persistent damage will still cause '''Lillia''' to trigger turret aggro, unless she casts ''Lilting Lullaby'' right before it runs out.
* {{ai|Dream-Laden Bough|Lillia|Dream Dust}} will mark targets if ''Lilting Lullaby'' is learned.
